results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 05
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around receiving visitors at home and the time, the calendar and seasons of the year. Demonstrative pronouns and adjectives are dealt with in this lesson.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 04
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around a tour of Paris and stresses pronominal adverbs, comparative and superlative adjectives and irregular comparisons.

results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. results.title: Le Capitaine H
results.brief_description: We follow the “Genevilliers”, a petrol barge, along the River Seine from the throbbing harbour to the mellow arches of Paris. Life bounded by the ever-changing banks has its own special kind of freedom. Captain Michael hacke and his family see the river in different weathers, colors and moods. They feel a unique brotherhood with their fellow river dwellers, a chance meeting with relatives is an occasion for celebration. No matter how the life of a bargee may change with time, the river remains a world unto itself. Commentary in English. Photography by Roger Fellous and jean-Jacques Languepin. Music by Jean Wiener.

results.title: Le Caillou
results.brief_description: A documentary about New Caledonia, which shows the nickel plant, and the inroads mining has made on the environment. Traditional forms of agriculture are shown, as well as the traditions of village life. These continue despite the French presence in the territory and the effects of nearly a century of resource exploitation on New Caledonia’s environment. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: Le bleu perdu
results.creator_credit: Paul Driessen, Pierre Moretti and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: An animated cartoon envisaging the kind of world that children of the future may well inherit when the last vestige of blue is blotted out from the sky by the spreading mantle of smog. In this story a little boy set out to find the blue sky he has been told of. A film without word.
